entry.title: WIND WARNING, Alma

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 over eastern sections. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
